item.description:
Hi Everyone Going To The White Water Rafting Event.

-------------------------------------------- 

 

Since a few of us are heading up to the location might as well share some driving expenses since fuel is costly and the like.

 

If there is interest, I will be behind the DEANGELO's on Hazard Rd in Enfield at 8 am

Can only waite 15 minutes there and then head out to the site. (8:15 on the road)

If you are interested,  stop in and we can choose who is driving and who is sharing expenses etc.

As it is now i only have an Avalon (Poor Mans Lexus) which will seat another 3 persons comfortably.

 

 

From Hartford:

I-91 North to exit # 47 East, pass the 2 traffic lights 1 for the exit and one for Phoenix Ave,

Right after Pheonix ave take a right into the small mall entrance and swing around to the back of Deangelo's,

I will be in the lot adjacent to the back of Deangelo's with the orange hat on and striped cone on the roof.

 

See ya at the lot -OR- at the HILLBILLY Shack in Charlemont.

al-r
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing an ORANGE HUNTING hat at the parking lot, and striped Cones on car roof.

group.who: River and Shore Kayak-r's of CT
group.name: ~~~~HARTFORD COUNTY RIVERS & CT SHORE KAYAK GROUP~~~~ HCR-SK

item.name: CarPool arrangements To the CrabApple White Water Event.
